title: Team Membership Status
description: JSON schema for the possible status of a User with respect to Team membership.

userId.description: The principal id of the user.

isMember.description: true if and only if the user is a member of the team

hasOpenInvitation.description: true if and only if  the user has an open invitation to join the team

hasOpenRequest.description: true if and only if  the user has an open request to join the team

canJoin.description: true if and only if the user requesting this status information can join the user to the team

membershipApprovalRequired.description: true if and only if  team admin approval is required for the user to join the team

hasUnmetAccessRequirement.description: true if and only if  there is at least one unmet access requirement for the user on the team

canSendEmail.description: true if and only if the user can send an email to the team
